s.text: So goes Brian De Palma's Snake Eyes , a thriller of serpentine excitement all the way up to that dud of a climax.

The buddy is screening a videotape of the fat man at the gaming table and zeroing in on the guy's wallet, trying to read his name, so that he can call the desk and find out the man's room number and tell Cage so that Cage can get there before the villain gets there.
